name: Qwerty Bird
description:
Much like the original Flappy Bird, press a button to fly up and try not to hit any pipes. Unlike that game, the button you must press keeps changing. The upcoming pipe will show you what you need to press.

Play in Training Mode if you're still building muscle memory with your keyboard. Each short level will introduce a new key to press and give you a few pipes to practice what you've learned so far.

Move on to Arcade Mode to play infinitely and go for a high score.

Or play in Classic Mode if you prefer something more similar to the original game. The gameplay is slightly more challenging — though still much easier than the original Flappy Bird — and only uses the X key.
